name: Varinium: Humanity's Last Hope!
description:
Humanity's last hope!

It is the year 13046 AD. or 2461 post-inhospitility

The earth was no longer sustainable 5000 years ago, and man has commercialised inter-galactic travel.

Nuclear power was used to squeeze out 2500 more years on earth after the great decline of the 8000s, but eventually the earth crumbled into a hollow celestial void, marking the age of post-inhospitility.

The last remnants of uranium and the means of plutonium production were seized, and have sustained human life for another 2461 years.

You are now a soldier of the intergalactic federation tasked to travel to the planet Otegiene VIII in the Catarina system.

A new substance has been discovered theorised to produce 20 times more efficient nuclear power than 1000 kilograms of uranium produced by silts, creatures of otegiene VIII known as Varinium.

Your task is to find the silt, take it to the closest radar before you run out of health!
